methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs this class with the given column comparator that will get called after the
 given row is converted to the column value for the given sort column

params.name: model
params.comment: the table model using this comparator

name: ThreadedBackupRowComparator
comment:
A version of ColumnRenderedValueBackupRowComparator that uses the 
 ThreadedTableModel's cache for column lookups
